title: Atoms for peace (Sweden)
brief_description: Shows how Sweden, though it is a small country, has become a world leader in the peaceful uses of atomic energy. Examples and advantages of nuclear power generation for the production of electricity and heat and use of radioactive isotopes for industry and medicine are presented. No other credits available.
